ovs.routes package¶

Submodules¶

ovs.routes.admin_routes module¶

Routes defined under ‘/admin’.

ovs.routes.admin_routes.manage_managers()[source]¶

Manager management page accessed by ‘/admin/manage_managers’.

GET, POST.
Permissions:
Accessible to ADMIN or higher level users.
Returns:A Flask template.

ovs.routes.auth_routes module¶

Routes defined under ‘/auth’.

ovs.routes.auth_routes.login()[source]¶

Login in page accessed by ‘/auth/login’.

GET, POST.
Permissions:
Accessible to ALL.
Returns:A Flask template.
ovs.routes.auth_routes.logout()[source]¶

Logout page accessed by ‘/auth/logout/’.

GET.
Permissions:
Accessible to ALL.
Returns:A Flask template.
ovs.routes.auth_routes.request_user_reset()[source]¶

Password reset request page accessed by ‘/auth/reset’.

GET, POST.
Permissions:
Accessible to ALL.
Returns:A Flask template.
ovs.routes.auth_routes.reset_user(token)[source]¶

Password reset page accessed by ‘/auth/reset/<token>’.

GET, POST.
Permissions:
Accessible to ALL.
Parameters:token – A password reset token.
Returns:A Flask template.
